name: François RINGLER
summary:
With 17 years of experience as a full-stack web developer, I have continuously evolved in the field of software development. My expertise lies primarily in back-end development, where I have worked exclusively with ASP.NET / .NET to build services and APIs. On the front-end side, I have developed versatility by exploring various technologies, including ASP.NET MVC and Angular.

My skill set also extends to user interface aspects, where I am comfortable with HTML and CSS, as well as frameworks such as Bootstrap and Material. In parallel, my database skills cover a range of solutions including MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

Passionate about the rapid evolution of technology, I have a growing interest in generative artificial intelligence, particularly models such as Claude.

experience.title: Senior Developer
experience.description:
On assignment at Liebherr.
Development of a platform to track machine KPIs (excavators, trucks) worldwide, including a live data component. (C#, Node.js, Vue.js / TypeScript, PostgreSQL, EventHub, Redis)

experience.title: Developer
experience.description:
- 2023-2024: developer in the digital asset management team (.NET, React, MongoDB, Postgres)
- 2017-2023: developer in the team responsible for creating tools to improve sales production (.NET, Angular, MariaDB, MongoDB)
- 2016-2017: lead developer for the launch of Veepee’s marketplace project (.NET Core, React, Izberg)

experience.title: Developer

Then redesign of the main website in C#/MVC with a mobile version.

experience.title: Junior Developer
